Player History
Had first career hit on 9/27/1982, off Eric Gilmour (NE)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/27/1983, off Bradley Guillermo (MAN)...
Won World Championship with Boston (FBA) in 1985...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Gashouse on 2/13/1988 to a 4-year deal worth $3,218,300 per year...
Traded from Gashouse to Plum Grove on 7/20/1988 (Going to PG: P J. Smith. Going to GHG: RF T. Nail)...
Traded from Plum Grove to Malibu on 5/17/1990 (Going to PG: LF F. Arana. Going to Mal: P J. Smith, P M. Daniel)...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 6/1/1990, going 2-0, 1.04...
Was selected to the 1990 Allstar game...
Injured on 8/18/1991 with a Hyper Extended Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 6/1/1992, going 4-0, 0.56...
